query.sql: SELECT branch_name, branch_code, enable_flag, branch_id, t.last_update_by, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') create_date, DATE_FORMAT(t.last_update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') last_update_date, (select CONCAT(CONCAT(user_code,'-'),user_name) from sys_user where user_id =t.last_update_by) last_update_user FROM fnd_branch t #WHERE_CLAUSE# order by branch_code

sqls.executeSql: INSERT INTO fnd_branch (branch_name, branch_code, enable_flag, create_by, last_update_by, create_date, last_update_date) VALUES (${@branch_name}, ${@branch_code}, ${@enable_flag}, ${@user_id}, ${@user_id}, NOW(), NOW())
update fnd_branch set enable_flag = ${@enable_flag} , branch_name = ${@branch_name} , last_update_by =${@user_id} , last_update_date = NOW() where branch_id = ${@branch_id}

query.name: combo
query.sql: SELECT branch_id , concat(concat(branch_code,'-'),branch_name) branch_name FROM fnd_branch t where t.enable_flag ='Y' order by branch_code
